Open Europa Content

Dec 4, 2019
Service Name Open Europa Content
Availability public
Category oe
Link https://github.com/openeuropa/oe_authentication
Description Authenticate users against the European Commission login service. Details of this service can be found here. EU Login service parameters are already set by default when installing the module.
Version
Stability
Popularity
Maintainers OE
